error_general.message: Something went wrong. Please try again.
error_general.description: Generic error message displayed when an unspecified error occurs

error_ext_platform_undefined.description: Error message displayed when the EXT_PLATFORM variable is not defined

error_getting_theme_value.description: Error message displayed when retrieving the theme value fails

error_setting_theme_value.description: Error message displayed when setting the theme value fails

error_logging_settings_changed.description: Error message displayed when updating crash log settings fails

error_getting_services_key.description: Error message displayed when retrieving the service key fails

error_save_password_prompt_saving.message: Error while saving "Save Item" prompt settings
error_save_password_prompt_saving.description: Error shown when saving the save password prompt settings

error_safe_browsing_reports_saving.message: Error while saving "Safe browsing" reports settings
error_safe_browsing_reports_saving.description: Error shown when saving safe browsing reports settings

error_safe_browsing_saving.description: Error shown when saving safe browsing settings

error_idle_lock_saving.description: Error message displayed when saving idle lock settings fails

error_auto_clear_clipboard_permission_de.message: Permission to read clipboard denied. Auto clear clipboard feature disabled.
error_auto_clear_clipboard_permission_de.description: Error message displayed when clipboard read permission is denied

error_auto_clear_clipboard_saving.message: Error while saving "Auto clear clipboard" settings
error_auto_clear_clipboard_saving.description: Error message displayed when saving auto clear clipboard settings fails

error_saving_notification_settings.description: Error message displayed when saving notification settings fails

error_saving_extension_name.message: Error! Failed to update extension name.
error_saving_extension_name.description: Error message displayed when updating the extension name fails

error_saving_context_menu_setting.description: Error message displayed when saving context menu settings fails

error_login_not_found.message: Something went wrong. Item not found.
error_login_not_found.description: Error message displayed when the requested login item is not found

error_username_copy_failed.message: Failed to copy username to clipboard.
error_username_copy_failed.description: Error message displayed when copying the username to the clipboard fails

error_password_copy_failed.message: Failed to copy password to clipboard.
error_password_copy_failed.description: Error message displayed when copying the password to the clipboard fails

error_uri_copy_failed.message: Failed to copy URL to clipboard.
error_uri_copy_failed.description: Error message displayed when copying the URI to the clipboard fails

error_autofill_failed.message: Failed to autofill. Please try again.
error_autofill_failed.description: Error message displayed when the autofill operation fails

error_no_response_from_tab.description: Error message displayed when there is no response from the browser tab

error_unknown_response_from_tab.description: Error message displayed when the browser tab returns an unknown response

error_storage_capacity_exceeded.message: Data size exceeded. Use less data or try a different browser.
error_storage_capacity_exceeded.description: Error shown when storage capacity exceeds the limit

error_scheme_mismatch.message: Please update the 2FAS Pass mobile app.
error_scheme_mismatch.description: Error shown when there is a scheme mismatch between the extension and mobile app

error_mobile_disconnected.message: Mobile device disconnected. Please try again.
error_mobile_disconnected.description: Error shown when the mobile device disconnects

error_timeout.description: Error message displayed when an operation times out due to inactivity

error_feature_wrong_data.message: Something went wrong. Our developer team is already working on it.
error_feature_wrong_data.description: Error message displayed when there is an issue with the shortcut settings
